title: Introduction to open data for journalists: finding stories in data, 27 February, 2014

details.description:
What to bring:

  1. Your own computer with wifi enabled for an open network
  2. You need to have a Google account
  3. You need to have Google Chrome browser installed on your laptop
  4. You will need Excel or Open Office
details.alternative_title: Course: Introduction to open data for journalists: finding stories in data, 27 February, 2014
details.location: The Open Data Institute, 65 Clifton Street, London, EC2A 4JE
